verses.name: Joshua 21:22
verses.text: And Kibzaim with her suburbs, and Beth–horon with her suburbs; four cities.

verses.name: Joshua 21:23
verses.text: And out of the tribe of Dan, Eltekeh with her suburbs, Gibbethon with her suburbs,

verses.name: Joshua 21:24
verses.text: Aijalon with her suburbs, Gath–rimmon with her suburbs; four cities.

verses.name: Joshua 21:25
verses.text: And out of the half tribe of Manasseh, Tanach with her suburbs, and Gath–rimmon with her suburbs; two cities.

verses.name: Joshua 21:26
verses.text: All the cities were ten with their suburbs for the families of the children of Kohath that remained.
